title: Is Now The Time To Scoop Up China Stocks?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: By one estimate, progress on the Chinese trade issue could generate a 4-5% move in a single day. So do tweets about trade progress suggest now is the time to scoop up a China ETF? I suggest that the reality of America’s and China’s current roles in the global economy and one key piece of market data do not imply a lucrative China play now. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
